summary: Successfully completed Phase 2: Environment Configuration. Updated DATABASE_URL to use Supabase Transaction Mode (port 6543) with proper pooling parameters (pgbouncer=true, connection_limit=1, pool_timeout=30, connect_timeout=30). Validated Supabase connection settings and confirmed PostgreSQL 17.4 connectivity through optimized pooler. Local environment is now production-ready with WASM-free Prisma configuration.
current_status: Phase 2 completed successfully. Local DATABASE_URL properly configured for serverless deployment. Connection pooling validated and working. Ready to proceed to Phase 3: Deployment & Validation. All acceptance criteria met for environment configuration phase.
